languages.text: "Непросто было следовать за вами сквозь бушующий шторм. Однако связь с Атласом Дитя работает в обе стороны. Мы двигались сквозь бурю, ориентируясь лишь на зов Атласа. И мы справились. Путь даже ценой множества жизней".

traits.locale_text: "Непросто было следовать за вами сквозь бушующий шторм. Однако связь с Атласом Дитя работает в обе стороны. Мы двигались сквозь бурю, ориентируясь лишь на зов Атласа. И мы справились. Путь даже ценой множества жизней".
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."
languages.original_text: "Непросто было следовать за вами сквозь бушующий шторм. Однако связь с Атласом Дитя работает в обе стороны. Мы двигались сквозь бурю, ориентируясь лишь на зов Атласа. И мы справились. Путь даже ценой множества жизней".

traits.locale_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. Even if it cost us many lives to do so."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

traits.locale_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. Even if it cost us many lives to do so."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

traits.locale_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

traits.locale_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

traits.locale_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

traits.locale_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: 「猛烈な嵐を抜けてあなたの後を追うのは苦労しました。ですが、御子とアトラスとの絆には相互作用があります。私たちはアトラスの導く声のままに嵐に立ち向かいました。そして抜けたのです。そのために多くの命が犠牲になろうと、問題ではありません」
languages.original_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「猛烈な嵐を抜けてあなたの後を追うのは苦労しました。ですが、御子とアトラスとの絆には相互作用があります。私たちはアトラスの導く声のままに嵐に立ち向かいました。そして抜けたのです。そのために多くの命が犠牲になろうと、問題ではありません」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: “在肆虐的风暴中跟上你的舰船，那并不是件容易的事情。不过，我们与圣仪之间的联结是双向的。在那场风暴中，我们仅仅靠着圣仪的指示，奋勇前进。我们成功了，虽然很多人付出了生命的代价，但这并不要紧。”
languages.original_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."

traits.locale_text: “在肆虐的风暴中跟上你的舰船，那并不是件容易的事情。不过，我们与圣仪之间的联结是双向的。在那场风暴中，我们仅仅靠着圣仪的指示，奋勇前进。我们成功了，虽然很多人付出了生命的代价，但这并不要紧。”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: « J'admets que traverser la tempête pour vous suivre n'a pas été des plus aisé. Cela dit, l'Atlas de l'Enfant fonctionne dans les deux sens : nous nous sommes simplement laissés guider par son appel. Et nous avons réussi. Non sans avoir subi quelques pertes, bien sûr, mais cela n'a aucune importance. »
languages.original_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."

traits.locale_text: « J'admets que traverser la tempête pour vous suivre n'a pas été des plus aisé. Cela dit, l'Atlas de l'enfant fonctionne dans les deux sens : nous nous sommes simplement laissés guider par son appel. Et nous avons réussi. Non sans avoir subi quelques pertes, bien sûr, mais cela n'a aucune importance. »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: «No fue sencillo seguirla a través de esa tormenta, pero el vínculo con el Atlas de la niña funciona en ambas direcciones. Desafiamos a la tempestad con tan solo la llamada del Atlas como guía, y hemos sobrevivido. No importa cuántas vidas nos haya costado hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."

traits.locale_text: «No fue sencillo seguirla a través de esa tormenta, pero el vínculo con el Atlas de la niña funciona en ambas direcciones. Desafiamos a la tempestad con tan solo la llamada del Atlas como guía, y hemos sobrevivido. No importa cuántas vidas nos haya costado hacerlo».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: "Es war nicht leicht, Euch durch den tosenden Sturm zu folgen. Aber die Verbindung mit dem Atlas des Kinds funktioniert in beide Richtungen. Wir haben dem Sturm mit dem Ruf des Atlas als einzigem Wegweiser getrotzt. Und wir haben es geschafft. Es ist gleichgültig, ob es uns viele Leben gekostet hat."
languages.original_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Es war nicht leicht, Euch durch den tosenden Sturm zu folgen. Aber die Verbindung mit dem Atlas des Kinds funktioniert in beide Richtungen. Wir haben dem Sturm mit dem Ruf des Atlas als einzigem Wegweiser getrotzt. Und wir haben es geschafft. Es ist gleichgültig, ob es uns viele Leben gekostet hat."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: "Şiddetli fırtınada sizi takip etmek kolay olmadı. Neyse ki Çocuk'un Atlası'na olan bağlantı, karşılıklı işliyor. Sadece Fırtınada yalnızca Atlas'ın çağrısının rehberliğinde ilerlemek durumunda kaldık. Neticede göğüs germesini bildik, bunun için çok can verdiysek de verdik."
languages.original_text: "It was not easy to follow you through the raging storm. However, the connection to the Child's Atlas works both ways. We braved the tempest with nothing but the call of the Atlas to guide us. And we made it. It doesn't matter if it cost us many lives to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Şiddetli fırtınanın içinden sizi takip etmek kolay olmadı. Neyse ki Çocuk'un Atlası'na olan bağlantı, karşılıklı işliyor. Fırtınaya sadece Atlas'ın çağrısının rehberliğiyle göğüs gerdik. Başardık da. Bunun karşılığında çok can verdiysek verdik."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader
